tokens.name: HEDGE / SOL

- **Stop Loss:** -15% (High volatility: -15% to -25%)

- **Ratio & Momentum:** While the user specified a ratio of 1.4 (balanced), the recent trades and flow strongly indicate buying pressure (buys/sells = 1.67). This aligns with "strong buying pressure" (ratio >1.5), warranting an aggressive BUY strategy.  
- **Volatility:** A 54.6% price increase classifies this as high volatility, dictating a -15% stop loss and 1-hour time frame.  
- **Volume:** $36,750 is high volume, suggesting a +25% take profit (midpoint of +20% to +40%).  

**Final Answer:**  
BUY | Limit:0% | TP:+25% | SL:-15% | Time:1h
